mapper.select: SELECT no, name, prior_no priorNo, regdate FROM categories WHERE prior_no is null
SELECT c.name, COUNT(c.no) num FROM categories c INNER JOIN products p ON p.category_no = c.no WHERE p.name LIKE '%' || #{searchValue} || '%' GROUP BY c.name
SELECT no, count(pNum) num FROM (SELECT DISTINCT c.name name, c.prior_no priorNo, c.no no, p.no pNum FROM categories c INNER JOIN products p ON p.category_no = c.no) GROUP BY no ORDER BY no ASC
